description: Main React component source file for a Tic Tac Toe game frontend, including the App component and supporting components (Board, Scoreboard), with logic for game state management, rendering, and user interaction.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component managing the game state, rendering the game UI, and handling interactions.

methods.name: Board({ squares, onSquareClick, gameStatus })
methods.description: Component rendering the 3x3 game grid, handling button clicks for each square.

methods.name: Scoreboard({ scores })
methods.description: Component displaying the current scores for players X and O.

methods.name: calculateWinner(squares)
methods.description: Function determining the game winner based on current board state.

methods.name: handleSquareClick
methods.description: Function handling user clicks on game squares, updating the game state.

methods.name: handleRestart
methods.description: Function resetting the game to initial state for a new round.

methods.name: handleResetScores
methods.description: Function resetting players' scores and restarting the game.
